_header: Now the Passion we will take
_description: ‘Passio domini’ — a portion of the metrical Life of Christ, in short couplets

BLAdd39996.First Lines:
Now þe passion we wole takeAnd þerof our speche
                    make…
BLAdd39996.Last Lines:
…Þat Ihesu þurgh þe harde stoneRos vp quyk in
                    blode & boon
BLAdd39996.Editions:
Stine,  Shirley Packard,
                        ed.  
             “The Metrical Life of Christ: Edited from MS BM Additional
                39996.” 
         Diss. University of Pennsylvania, 1962 [DA 23.1010].
